snippet.title: Bannermen Launch Trailer (OFFICIAL)
snippet.description:
Bannermen is a real-time strategy game, available on Steam. The game includes online multiplayer, skirmish and a full-length singleplayer campaign.

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/699740/BANNERMEN/

Website/Beta sign-up: https://www.bannermen.net/

Discord: https://Discord.gg/Bannermen
